log.title: July 2025 Update
log.content:
Added automated model assignment tool.
Monthly bug fix, improved usability. Removed local models from AI list.

log.title: June 2025 Update
log.content:
Optimized code to improve its compatibility.
Sound effects of 3D subtitle and subtitles above player's head can now be turned off in menu.
Fixed the issue of incorrect player color display in multiplayer games.
Added a killfeed system and customization options in the personalization page.

log.title: May 2025 Update
log.content:
Improved code, added optional player HUD, fixed the issue of incorrect voiceover.
Dynamic hit number is now available in workshop.

log.title: April 2025 Update
log.content:
Added UI settings options, including subtitle toggle and style customization.
Improved NPC information display with fade-in and fade-out effects.
Added a new feature where NPCs will follow the mouse direction when hovering over the model viewer in the dialogue menu.

log.title: March 2025 Update
log.content:
Added AI dialogue system with TTS support. Improved localization and UI. 
Introduced a new home tab in the main menu.
Resolved multiple critical issues, including subtitle line break issue, dialogue punctuation inconsistencies, NPC spawning conflicts in campaign maps, and server-client synchronization problems.

log.title: February 2025 Update
log.content:
Introduced a card-based negotiation system with over 200 unique cards.
Implemented deck tab in menu for enhanced accessibility.

log.title: January 2025 Update
log.content:
Added NPC dialogue menu.
Added typing sound when NPC is talking.
Modified NPC dialogue mechanics, adjusting trigger probabilities and participant numbers.
Introduced Python-based modding tools to enable community content creation.

log.title: December 2024 Update
log.content:
Completed the NPC identity system framework with a dedicated menu.
Added a subtitle system and an NPC rank system with promotion text effects.
Added NPC dialogue manager for efficient conversation handling.
